subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Wayne Rooney sent Manchester United to the top of the Premier League Saturday after a win over Liverpool in a match preceded by Luis Suárez’s refusal to shake Patrice Evra’s hand.
snippet: Wayne Rooney sent Manchester United to the top of the Premier League Saturday after a win over Liverpool in a match preceded by Luis Suárez’s refusal to shake Patrice Evra’s hand.
